title: Quick Shoot Production from Sweet Potato

tasks.task: Producing sweet potato shoots using slip production method
subtasks: Collecting three types of sweet potatoes
Cutting sweet potato roots into two sections
Using toothpicks to anchor the cut roots in water
Maintaining water level (1 cm) in the cups
Waiting two weeks for shoot emergence
Removing shoots from the mother roots
Transferring shoots to new cups for rooting
Preparing for transplantation after one week
